decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Design and Access Statement REV B; PL354: Existing & Proposed Bay Window Horizontal Section Detail REV B; PL353: Proposed Front Door ED1 - Vertical Section REV B; PL351: Proposed Windows Glazing Sections for GW2-GW3 and FW1-FW4 REV A; PL350 REV C: Proposed Windows Glazing Details and Sections for GW1; PL341 REV A: Existing Windows Glazing Sections for GW2-GW3 and FW1-FW4; PL340 REV A: Existing Windows Glazing Details and Sections for GW1; PL301 REV F: Proposed Window & Door Elevations; PL300 REV G: Proposed Window Elevations; PL210 REV G: Proposed Floor Plans OPT2 Elevations and Section A-A; PL100 REV E: Existing Plans Elevations and Section A-A; PL090 REV A: Block Plan; PL080 REV A: Location plan; PL352 REC C: Existing Front Door ED1 - Vertical Section
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension; replacement windows and doors
